protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Beta-adrenergic receptors mediate the catecholamine- induced activation of adenylate cyclase through the action of G proteins. Beta-3 is involved in the regulation of lipolysis and thermogenesis

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
